data.eml:eml: A new species of Ameroseius (Mesostigmata: Ameroseiidae) from the Indian Thar Desert

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bhattacharyya, Asit K. (2004): A new species of Ameroseius (Mesostigmata: Ameroseiidae) from the Indian Thar Desert. Zootaxa 620: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158067
